overview:
City-Guides for luxury brands to engage influential women shoppers with quality content.

GuiaVulevu.com aims to provide an high quality content, fancy places, trendy tips and deals that attract latin women ABC1 eager to learn and buy from the most exclusive international brands. The old model of interruption advertising is over. We help brands connect, engage, and be discovered by this influential shoppers, telling brand stories by offering interesting, useful entertaining content that engages the audience and provides information they want to read.
